Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored an unbeaten 86 off 94 balls
Shreyas Iyer scored 48 not out off 36 balls
Kuldeep Yadav took 2 wickets for 11 runs in 3 overs
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 14 runs in 2 overs
Pakistan collapsed from 155/2 to 191 all out in 8 overs
Pre-Game Insights: India won by 7 wickets (with 117 balls remaining)
Rohit Sharma made 217 runs in 147 balls over his last two trips to the crease
Shreyas Iyer is having an important hit out there
Shubman Gill scored 58 off 52 balls in his previous ODI against Pakistan
Pakistan's projected score at 35.3 was just 212 due to Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav
Rohit Sharma went with his gut and went for the DRS to get Mohammad Rizwan out lbw
Rizwan survived a difficult situation by sweeping Ravindra Jadeja and getting lucky
Hardik Pandya gave up the 12th boundary in the 13 overs
India's first wicket was taken by Mohammed Siraj with a skiddy one that caught Abdullah Shafique lbw
Post-Match Reflections: India beat Pakistan. They're 8-0 now in World Cups
The stadium is calling out his name. Just a little while earlier, he was fooling around with one of the umpires, showing off his biceps to them
India's captain has made 217 runs in 147 balls over his last two trips to the crease
Shubman Gill got going and smashed the first ball he faced from Shaheen Afridi to the extra cover boundary
Kuldeep Yadav and Jasprit Bumrah have ripped up those calculations
Pakistan's collapse from 155/2 to 191 all out in 8 overs was a major win for India
India's quicks were pulling it back to the 6m mark instead of the 4m mark and hope to get some movement off the seam
Miscellaneous Highlights: The sounds off the bat is solid once more, but that doesn't matter. Gill sees width outside off and wants to cash in
There was genius in this - Jasprit Bumrah picked up two wickets in two overs with the old ball on a pitch that has offered no real help to the bowlers barring a bit of low bounce
Kuldeep Yadav and Shreyas Iyer were the key architects triggering a Pakistan collapse of 8 for 36
Shaheen Afridi has been boshed straight down the ground for six by Rohit Sharma with the Motera crowd baying for more
Rizwan was done in by the offcutter
Kuldeep saw Babar going for the sweep, flattened his trajectory, quickened his pace and had the Pakistan captain in a tangle
Babar was looking to almost late cut a ball that wasn't short, that was very stump-to-stump, on a pitch that has em skid through low
